author: Haley Henschel
title: Working from home? A gaming chair can improve your posture and productivity.
description: TL;DR: As of March 23, Best Buy has a couple of AKRacing and Gamdias gaming chairs on sale for up to 46% off. Aside from maybe crappy WiFi and a poorly stocked snack cabinet, few things sour the work-from-home experience faster than uncomfortable seating. (An…
content:

Aside from maybe crappy WiFi and a poorly stocked snack cabinet, few things sour the work-from-home experience faster than uncomfortable seating. (A… [+2273 chars]
